Verses: 1 en Magane, En Gnaanaththai Gavaniththu, En Buththikku Un Seviyai Saai;
2 appozhudhu Nee Vivegaththaippenikkolvaai, Un Udhadugal Arivaik Kaaththukkollum.
3 parasthreeyin Udhadugal Thenkoodupol Ozhugum; Aval Vaai Enneyilum Mirudhuvaayirukkum.
4 aval Seygaiyin Mudivo Ettiyaippolak Kasappum, Irupuramum Karukkulla Pattayampol Koormaiyumaayirukkum.
5 aval Kaaladigal Maranaththukku Irangum; Aval Nadaigal Paadhaalaththaip Patrippogum.
6 nee Jeevamaarkkaththai Sindhiththukkollaadhapadikku, Avaludaiya Nadaigal Maarimaari Vigaarappadum; Avaigalai Ariyamudiyaadhu.
7 aadhalaal Pillaigale, Ippozhudhu Enakku Sevikodungal; En Vaayin Vasanangalai Vittu Neengaadhirungal.
8 un Vazhiyai Avalukku Dhoorappaduththu; Avaludaiya Veettin Vaasalaikkitti Seraadhe.
9 serndhaal Un Menmaiyai Anniyargalukkum, Un Aayusin Kaalaththaik Kodoorarukkum Koduththuviduvaai.
10 anniyar Un Selvaththinaal Thirupthiyadaivaargal; Un Prayaasaththinpalan Puraththiyaarudaiya Veettil Serum.
11 mudivile Un Maamsamum Un Sareeramum Uruvazhiyumbodhu Nee Dhukkiththu:
12 aiyo, Podhagaththai Naan Veruththene, Kadindhukolludhalai En Manam Alatchiyampanninadhe!
13 en Podhagarin Sollai Naan Kelaamalum, Enakku Ubadhesampanninavargalukku En Seviyai Saayaamalum Ponene!
14 sabaikkullum Sangaththukkullum Konjankuraiya Ellaath Theemaikkumullaanene! Endru Muraiyiduvaai.
15 un Kinatrilulla Thanneeraiyum, Un Thuravil Oorugira Jalaththaiyum Paanampannu.
16 un Ootrugal Veliyilum Un Vaaikkaalgal Veedhigalilum Paaivadhaaga.
17 avaigal Anniyarukkum Uriyavaigalaayiraamal, Unakke Uriyavaigalaayiruppadhaaga.
18 un Ootrukkan Aaseervadhikkappaduvadhaaga; Un Ilavayadhin Manaiviyode Magizhndhiru.

19 avale Nesikkappadaththakka Penmaanum, Azhagaana Varaiyaadum Poliruppaalaaga; Avaludaiya Sthanangale Eppozhudhum Unnaith Thirupthiseyvadhaaga; Avaludaiya Nesaththaal Nee Eppozhudhum Mayangiyiruppaayaaga.
20 en Magane, Nee Parasthreeyinmel Mayangith Thirindhu, Anniyasthreeyin Maarbaith Thazhuvavendiyadhenna?
21 manushanudaiya Vazhigal Karththarin Kangalukku Munbaaga Irukkiradhu; Avanudaiya Vazhigalellaavatraiyum Avar Seerthookkippaarkkiraar.
22 dhunmaarkkanai Avanudaiya Akkiramangale Pidiththukkollum; Than Paavakkayirugalaal Kattappaduvaan.
23 avan Buththiyaik Kelaadhadhinaal Madindhu, Than Madhikettin Migudhiyinaal Mayangippovaan.
